DOC.brief_summary: Phase 1 trial retinal pigment epithelium replacement subject wet age-related macular degeneration rapidly progress vision loss
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of Implantation Of Retinal Pigment Epithelium In Subjects With Acute Wet Age Related Macular Degeneration
DOC.detailed_description: Phase 1 , open-label , safety feasibility study implantation PF-05206388 ( human embryonic stem cell derive retinal pigment epithelium ) subject wet age relate macular degeneration rapid vision loss
DOC.criteria: Male /or postmenopausal female subject age 60 year . Diagnosis wet Agerelated Macular Degeneration ( AMD ) plus rapid recent vision decline An informed consent document sign date subject legal representative . Pregnant female ; breastfeed female ; female childbearing potential . Treatment investigational drug within 30 day ( determined local requirement , whichever long ) 5 halflives precede first dose study medication . Current previous significant ocular disease study eye , determine investigator .
